text: Mikhail Vasilyevich Sagin (; born 3 October 1962) is a former Russian football player. ==External links== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Baltika Kaliningrad players Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players Category:SKA Odessa players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football forwards Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mikhail Sagin
